description: Discover the best hotels in Jayapura, Indonesia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Contemporary Indonesia Retreat in Jayapura with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Discover the best of Papua's vibrant capital with an escape to this modern retreat, conveniently located in the heart of Jayapura. From the contemporary rooms and well-equipped fitness centre to the all-day restaurant, Lime Resto and Terrace, you'll have everything you need for a stress-free stay. Steps away from bustling markets, waterfront views and cultural landmarks, Mercure Jayapura puts you right on the pulse of adventure. Nearby Lake Sentani offers incredible landscapes and traditional experiences, while Hamadi Beach is within easy access.

seo.title: Hotels in Jayapura - Indonesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Jayapura, Indonesia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
